pr_title: Vijay long poll link abort fix

timeline.message:
Chaning two acceptAsync methods to use internal thread pool.
And depcreating and renaming two methods as their spellings were wrong.
Fixing a bug with where long polling receive requests are not completed or retried on link abort and recreate.
Set message id and session id of the first message in a send batch on the combined batch message.
